Description:
Detects when an attacker registers a new IFilter for an extension. Microsoft Windows Search uses filters to extract the content of items for inclusion in a full-text index.
You can extend Windows Search to index new or proprietary file types by writing filters to extract the content, and property handlers to extract the properties of files.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Register New IFiltre For Persistence
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" ((target_object="*\\SOFTWARE\\Classes\\.*" target_object="*\\PersistentHandler*") OR (target_object="*\\SOFTWARE\\Classes\\CLSID*" target_object="*\\PersistentAddinsRegistered\\{89BCB740-6119-101A-BCB7-00DD010655AF}*")) NOT ((target_object="*\\CLSID\\{4F46F75F-199F-4C63-8B7D-86D48FE7970C}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{4887767F-7ADC-4983-B576-88FB643D6F79}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{D3B41FA1-01E3-49AF-AA25-1D0D824275AE}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{72773E1A-B711-4d8d-81FA-B9A43B0650DD}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{098f2470-bae0-11cd-b579-08002b30bfeb}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{1AA9BF05-9A97-48c1-BA28-D9DCE795E93C}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{2e2294a9-50d7-4fe7-a09f-e6492e185884}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{34CEAC8D-CBC0-4f77-B7B1-8A60CB6DA0F7}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{3B224B11-9363-407e-850F-C9E1FFACD8FB}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{3DDEB7A4-8ABF-4D82-B9EE-E1F4552E95BE}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{5645C8C1-E277-11CF-8FDA-00AA00A14F93}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{5645C8C4-E277-11CF-8FDA-00AA00A14F93}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{58A9EBF6-5755-4554-A67E-A2467AD1447B}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{5e941d80-bf96-11cd-b579-08002b30bfeb}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{698A4FFC-63A3-4E70-8F00-376AD29363FB}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{7E9D8D44-6926-426F-AA2B-217A819A5CCE}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{8CD34779-9F10-4f9b-ADFB-B3FAEABDAB5A}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{DD75716E-B42E-4978-BB60-1497B92E30C4}\\*" OR target_object="*\\CLSID\\{E2F83EED-62DE-4A9F-9CD0-A1D40DCD13B6}\\*" OR
